name: HoP-PiE-PoP
description:
Warning: This is a 2 players-ONLY Versus Puzzle Game

Genre: Waifu Puzzle Battle for Beach Domination! This is a Puyo-Puyo style puzzle game with a twist. Play as Aoi or Anri and unleash your special attacks on the opponent at the right time to claim your supremacy on land and water.

HoP-PiE-PoP was made in two days during the Global Game Jam 2017

Code (& Game Design) : Elias Farhan (Team KwaKwa)

Game Design : David Javet (Tchagata Games)

Art (Aoi) / UI : Kevin "Hoot" Peclet (Team KwaKwa)

Art (Anri) / UI : Matthieu "Gosh" Pellet (Tchagata Games)

Composer / Sound Design : Antoine Tuloup

Voice (Aoi&Anri) : Delphine Grataloup
